akn:section.akn:heading: Department of Energy Quantum User Expansion for Science and Technology program

akn:content.akn:p: (a) In general The Secretary of Energy (referred to in this section as the “Secretary”) shall establish and carry out a program, to be known as the “Quantum User Expansion for Science and Technology program” or “QUEST program”, to encourage and facilitate access to United States quantum computing hardware and quantum computing clouds for research purposes—
